title: Time to Impeach? | Guests: Josh Rogin & Rep. Lauren Boebert | 8/31/21
description:
The Biden administration will lie about small matters, so what big matters will it also lie about? Pat Gray joins to discuss the "bright side" of Afghanistan, like how good the Taliban look in America’s gear. Author and columnist Josh Rogin joins to discuss China's interest in Afghanistan and America not doing everything it could to save stranded Americans. Rep. Lauren Boebert joins to share the impeachment case against President Biden. Glenn plays a rendition of the national anthem that dates back to the 1800s and delves into the lyrics and their application. Glenn debunks a tweet that claimed the Nazarene Fund backed out of a job.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
